ValidationRule.description: Ensures that "Out of Office Start" and "Out of Office End" must be populated simultaneously, and that "Out of Office End" must be later that "Out of Office Start".
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISNULL( DS_Packages__Out_of_Office_End__c ), NOT( ISNULL( DS_Packages__Out_of_Office_Start__c ) ) ) || AND( ISNULL( DS_Packages__Out_of_Office_Start__c ), NOT( ISNULL( DS_Packages__Out_of_Office_End__c ) ) ) || DS_Packages__Out_of_Office_Start__c > DS_Packages__Out_of_Office_End__c
ValidationRule.errorMessage: When setting Conquer Out of Office Dates, please ensure that both Start and End Date are filled out, and that End Date is later or equal to Start Date.
